cpsc433

Class Predicate

  • java.lang.Object
    • cpsc433.Predicate

  • public class Predicate
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a predicate of the form predicate-name ( param , ... )

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2005-2016, Department of Computer Science, University of Calgary. Permission to use, copy, modify, distribute and sell this software and its documentation for any purpose is hereby granted without fee, provided that the above copyright notice appear in all copies and that both that copyright notice and this permission notice appear in supporting documentation. The Department of Computer Science makes no representations about the suitability of this software for any purpose. It is provided "as is" without express or implied warranty.

    Author:
    Rob Kremer

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Predicate.ParamType
      Represents the types of the parameters to the predicate.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Returns:
        the name of the predicate

      • getArity

        public int getArity()
        Returns the number of paramteres.
        Returns:
        the number of parameters of this predicate. Note that an empty predcate (eg. "hot()" still has arity of 1 (a empty string parameter).

      • getParamType

        public Predicate.ParamType getParamType(int index)
        Returns the ParamType of the parameter at index. Note that index should be less than the value returned by getArity(). The first parameter is at index 0.
        Parameters:
        index - an index into the vector of parameters.
        Returns:
        a ParamType representing the type of the parameter.

      • getStringParam

        public java.lang.String getStringParam(int index)
        Returns the value of a string parameter at index index. If the index is out of range or the parameter is not of a string type, returns null.
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the parameter to evaluate
        Returns:
        a String representing the value of parameter at the index, or null.

      • getSetParam

        public java.util.TreeSet<Pair<Predicate.ParamType,java.lang.Object>> getSetParam(int index)
        Returns the value of a set parameter at index index as a TreeSet<Pair<ParamType,Object<<. Thus, nested sets are allowed. If the index is out of range or the parameter is not of a set type, returns null.
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the parameter to evaluate
        Returns:
        a TreeSet representing the value of parameter at the index, or null.

      • getLongParam

        public java.lang.Long getLongParam(int index)
        Returns the value of a long integer parameter at index index. If the index is out of range or the parameter is not of a Long type, returns null.
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the parameter to evaluate
        Returns:
        a Long representing the value of parameter at the index, or null.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object

      • error

        public static void error(java.lang.String msg)
        Utility method to format and channel error messages to System.out.
        Parameters:
        msg - the message to write to System.out.
